headline: Berkshire Hathaway 13F Filing Reveals Warren Buffett's Secret Stock
summary: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway revealed a position in embattled healthcare giant UnitedHealth Group while showing smaller stakes in longtime holdings Apple and Bank of America, according to a regulatory filing Thursday.
